doc.title: D'Bun: The Ultimate Da Pau!
doc.text: I/PRP have/VBP always/RB enjoyed/VBN our/PRP$ local/JJ Da/NNP Pau/NNP much/RB more/JJR than/IN the/DT Hong/NNP Kong/NNP version/NN that/IN you/PRP eat/VBP at/IN Dim/NNP Sum/NNP restaurants/NN ./. I/PRP like/VB it/PRP when/WRB you/PRP tear/VB off/IN the/DT piece/NN of/IN paper/NN and/CC the/DT bottom/NN comes/VBZ off/IN ,/, releasing/IN the/DT steam/NN and/CC aroma/NN of/IN the/DT juicy/JJ pork/NN within/NN ./. I/PRP like/VB it/PRP even/RB more/JJR when/WRB you/PRP bite/VB into/IN it/PRP and/CC juices/NNS ooze/RB down/IN your/PRP$ fingers/NN !/. Mimi/JJ at/IN D'bun/JJ makes/NNS such/IN a/DT Pau/NNP and/CC I/PRP know/VB that/WDT she/PRP is/VBZ very/RB passionate/JJ about/IN her/PRP craft/NN ./. So/RB much/RB so/IN that/DT whenever/NN I/PRP drop/VBD by/IN to/TO buy/VB Pau/NNP ,/, she/PRP will/MD quickly/RB share/VB with/IN me/PRP her/PRP latest/JJS ideas/NNS on/IN what/WP she/PRP is/VBZ doing/VBG to/TO make/VB her/PRP Pau/NNP better/NN ./. It/PRP 's/VBZ no/RB surprise/JJ that/IN her/PRP char/NNP siew/NNP pau/NNP won/IN the/DT Lian/NN He/PRP Wan/NNP Bao/NNP award/NN for/IN the/DT Four/JJ Heavenly/NN Kings/NN of/IN Pau/NNP in/IN Singapore/NNP !/. So/CC I/PRP knew/VBD that/IN she/PRP was/VBD more/RB than/IN up/RP to/TO the/DT challenge/NN of/IN creating/VBG the/DT Ultimate/NNP version/NN of/IN the/DT Da/NNP Pau/NNP ./. What/WP is/VBZ the/DT Ultimate/NNP Da/NNP Pau/NNP going/NN to/TO look/VB like/IN ?/. Well/RB since/IN most/NN of/IN the/DT Pau/NNP consists/NN of/IN pork/NN meat/NN ,/, we/PRP managed/VBD to/TO get/VB Angliss/NN to/TO sponsor/VB some/DT Kurobuta/JJ pork/NN belly/NN for/IN the/DT Pau/NNP !/. But/CC that/WDT is/VBZ not/RB all/RB ,/, we/PRP are/VBP adding/JJ scallops/NN to/TO the/DT pork/NN meat/NN ./. Not/RB just/RB one/CD type/NN of/IN scallop/NN ,/, but/CC three/CD different/JJ types/NN ./. First/JJ ,/, each/JJ Pau/NNP will/MD have/VB a/DT one/CD whole/JJ scallop/NN embedded/NN in/IN it/PRP ,/, then/RB Mimi/PRP is/VBZ going/NN to/TO add/VB dried/JJ scallops/NN to/TO the/DT mix/NN ./. We/PRP got/VBD Maggi/JJ to/TO sponsor/VB some/NN of/IN their/PRP$ Chef/NN Master/NNP Stock/NNP which/WDT is/VBZ a/DT premium/NN grade/NN Shang/NN Tang/NN made/VBD from/IN scallop/NNP extract/NNP that/WDT is/VBZ used/VBD by/IN Hotel/NN Chefs/NN to/TO prepare/VB the/DT most/JJ exquisite/JJ Shark/NN 's/POS Fin/NN Soup/NN and/CC we/PRP add/VB that/WDT to/TO the/DT mix/NN to/TO give/VB the/DT Pau/NNP juice/NN some/NN extra/JJ oomph/NN !/. Throw/VBN in/IN mushrooms/NNS and/CC egg/NN and/CC you/PRP got/VBD the/DT Ultimate/NNP Da/NNP Pau/NNP !/. Ca/RB n't/RB wait/VB to/TO taste/VB it/PRP !/. To/PRP buy/VB tickets/VB to/TO the/DT Ultimate/NNP Hawker/NNP Fest/NNP ,/, please/NNP visit/NN http://www.touch.org.sg/ultimatehawkerfest2012Â /NN Venue/NN :/: Millenia/NNP Walk/NNP Date/NNP :/: 20/CD Oct/NNP 2012/NNP Time/NNP :/: 5pm/NNP to/TO 10pm/VB Tickets/RB now/RB on/IN sale/NN at/IN Millenia/NN Walk/NN and/CC will/VB also/RB be/VB on/IN sale/NN on/IN the/DT day/NN of/IN the/DT festival/JJ Many/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO D'Bun/NN ,/, and/CC Nestle/RB who/WP will/MD be/VB donating/VBD all/DT proceeds/NN to/TO Touch/NNP Community/NNP Services/NNP !/. Special/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO Angliss/NN ,/, one/CD of/IN the/DT leading/JJ food/NN services/NN in/IN Singapore/NN for/IN being/VBG a/DT major/NN meat/NN sponsor/NN for/IN our/PRP$ event/NN ./. They/PRP are/VBP sponsoring/JJ meats/NNS and/CC seafoods/NN for/IN quite/RB a/DT few/JJ of/IN our/PRP$ stalls/NNS ,/, making/VBG it/PRP possible/JJ for/IN us/PRP$ to/TO reduce/VB our/PRP$ cost/NN and/CC donating/NN more/NN of/IN the/DT funds/NN to/TO charity/VB !/. Bravo/DT Angliss/NN !/. Thank/IN you/PRP very/RB much/JJ !/.
